import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {actAddUserRequest} from '../../../actions/managerAction'; class CreateUser extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { id:'', txtUsername:'', txtPassword:'' } } componentDidMount(){ var {match}= this.props; if(match){ var id=match.params.id; API.get(`/users/${id}`).then( res=>{ var data = res.data; this.setState({ id:data.id, txtUsername:data.username, txtPassword:data.password }) } ) } } render() { const {id,txtUsername,txtPassword}=this.state; return (
